hero.title: Technology that flows
hero.description: We build self-healing systems that scale naturally. No crashes. No exploding costs. Just a steady, uninterrupted flow.

philosophy.heroDescription: We don't believe in forcing technology. We build systems that adapt, heal themselves, and scale without resistance.
philosophy.waterDescription: Water always finds its way. It adapts to the terrain, flows around obstacles, and becomes stronger in groups. That's how we build digital systems – flexible, self-healing, and infinitely scalable.
philosophy.erlangDescription: We build on the Erlang VM – a platform designed to never go down. Processes that crash automatically revive. Systems that handle millions of simultaneous connections. Technology that WhatsApp and Discord trust.

audience.heroDescription: If your service crashes under high load, if cloud costs are exploding, or if you need guaranteed uptime – then we're the right partner.
audience.scalingDescription: You've started seeing limitations in your current architecture. Servers that crash. Databases that can't handle the load. Costs that spiral.
audience.uptimeDescription: Every minute of downtime costs money or trust. You need systems built to never go down.
audience.costDescription: You scale by throwing more hardware at the problem. But there are smarter ways to handle millions of users.
audience.notForDescription: You just need a simple website, a landing page, or visual design. For that, there are simpler tools.

results.heroDescription: We measure success in uptime, scalability, and reduced costs – not in PowerPoint presentations.

contact.heroDescription: Fill in the form and we'll analyze if our philosophy fits your needs. Response within 2 hours.
contact.formDescription: The more details you provide, the better we can assess how we can help you. Think about: Number of users, current problems, tech stack.
contact.problemPlaceholder: E.g: "We have a SaaS platform with 50,000 users. During high traffic (>1000 concurrent) the system becomes slow and sometimes crashes. We run Node.js on AWS with a PostgreSQL database. Cloud costs have increased by 300% in the last year."
contact.nextStepsDescription: We've sent this analysis to our team. If the fit score is above 60, one of our architects will reach out within 2 hours to schedule a deeper conversation.
